25 #ifndef __G_TIMER_H__
26 #define __G_TIMER_H__
27 
28 #if !defined (__GLIB_H_INSIDE__) && !defined (GLIB_COMPILATION)
29 #error "Only <glib.h> can be included directly."
30 #endif
31 
32 #include <glib/gtypes.h>
33 
34 G_BEGIN_DECLS
35 
36 /* Timer
37  */
38 
39 /* microseconds per second */
40 typedef struct _GTimer    GTimer;
41 
42 #define G_USEC_PER_SEC 1000000
43 
44 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
45 GTimer*  g_timer_new           (void);
46 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
47 void   g_timer_destroy         (GTimer      *timer);
48 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
49 void   g_timer_start           (GTimer      *timer);
50 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
51 void   g_timer_stop          (GTimer      *timer);
52 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
53 void   g_timer_reset           (GTimer      *timer);
54 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
55 void   g_timer_continue        (GTimer      *timer);
56 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
57 gdouble  g_timer_elapsed         (GTimer      *timer,
58           gulong      *microseconds);
59 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_2_62
60 gboolean g_timer_is_active       (GTimer      *timer);
61 
62 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
63 void     g_usleep                (gulong       microseconds);
64 
65 G_GNUC_BEGIN_IGNORE_DEPRECATIONS
66 GLIB_DEPRECATED_IN_2_62
67 void     g_time_val_add          (GTimeVal    *time_,
68                                   glong        microseconds);
69 GLIB_DEPRECATED_IN_2_62_FOR(g_date_time_new_from_iso8601)
70 gboolean g_time_val_from_iso8601 (const gchar *iso_date,
71           GTimeVal    *time_);
72 GLIB_DEPRECATED_IN_2_62_FOR(g_date_time_format)
73 gchar*   g_time_val_to_iso8601   (GTimeVal    *time_) G_GNUC_MALLOC;
74 G_GNUC_END_IGNORE_DEPRECATIONS
75 
76 G_END_DECLS
77 
78 #endif /* __G_TIMER_H__ */
--- EOF ---
